Aether Setup and Deployment

Every Aether component has an associated Helm file, to enable deployment via Kubernetes to your infrastructure of choice.

You can also use these helm files to create a local installation on your computer using Minikube, but you might find it easier to just use Docker instead. For instructions on how to do a local installation with Docker, take a look here.
